mapper.sql: cno, ctno, cname, cpeople, cphone, caddress, cbirthday, cperiod, climit, pno, province, city, district, cremark, ctaxes, cregistphone, cbank, cbanknumber, cregistaddress, other1, other2, other3, other4, jifen, creatdate, remark3, remark4, remark5
mapper.select: SELECT cus.*,custy.ctname ctname,custy.ctisvip isvip,vip.vno vno,vip.vjoindate vjoindate,vip.venddate venddate,vip.currentjifen vjifen,peo.pname pname,peo.pphone pphone FROM customer AS cus LEFT JOIN customer_type AS custy ON cus.ctno = custy.ctno LEFT JOIN vip AS vip ON vip.cno=cus.cno LEFT JOIN people AS peo ON peo.pno=cus.pno WHERE cus.cname LIKE '%${cn}%' AND cus.cphone LIKE '%${cp}%'

select
distinct
from customer
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into customer (cno, ctno, cname, cpeople, cphone, caddress, cbirthday, cperiod, climit, pno, province, city, district, cremark, ctaxes, cregistphone, cbank, cbanknumber, cregistaddress, other1, other2, other3, other4, jifen, creatdate, remark3, remark4, remark5) values (#{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cbirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cperiod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{climit,jdbcType=REAL}, #{pno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctaxes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cregistphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cbanknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cregistaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jifen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update customer
